definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to defend/to safeguard/to protect/to uphold/to maintain
to speak in defense of/to argue in favor of/to defend/to plead
to bless/to cherish/to take good care of/to conserve
to cherish/to treasure/to take care of/to love and protect

sentences.english: People drink realgar wine to protect themselves from illness.
sentences.chinese: 人们喝雄黄侍者护本身免于害病。

sentences.english: Dad always stuck up for you, you should do the same for him.
sentences.chinese: 爸总是“护”着你，你应该知恩图报。

sentences.english: I glimpsed the dancer balancing herself on the ambulance by become.
sentences.chinese: 我掽巧瞥见舞蹈者在捄护车上使自己保持平衡。

sentences.english: At the same time the belt has a good effect on protecting the waist.
sentences.chinese: 腰带同时还可以起到一定的护腰的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the function of Shoulder Belt Protector in preventing the dislocation of shoulder for brain apoplexy patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨护肩带对脑卒中患者肩关节脱位的预防作用。

sentences.english: Really, if the eastern temple livings to change, I can no defend you.
sentences.chinese: 的确，倘若东宫生变，我无法护你。

sentences.english: The Celebrant receives the Body of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 愿基督的圣血，护祐我得到永生。

sentences.english: The police and prosecutors have worked as the authorities' hitmen， trying to keep the meida from reporting government corruption.
sentences.chinese: 警方和检控官都护着政府，阻挠传媒报导政府贪污。

sentences.english: Participants should bring their own sticks, mouth guard, shin pads.
sentences.chinese: 参加者需要自备球棍，牙箍，护胫。

sentences.english: God willed that Cosette's love should encounter one of the loves which save.
sentences.chinese: 上帝要珂赛特遇到的爱是那种护助人的爱。

sentences.english: The body placement of each code corresponds directly to its place in the Shields.
sentences.chinese: 身体上放置的每个代码直接对应它在护场上的位置。

sentences.english: You can even use latex gloves to cover your hands.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以使用乳胶手套护住手。

sentences.english: The two that concern me most are about his apologetics and his significance.
sentences.chinese: 其中最显著的两项是他的护教学和他的重要性。

sentences.english: Local government tends to protect the Uyghur people .
sentences.chinese: 在广东，几乎所有的政府部门都护着新疆人。

sentences.english: Green leaves protect safflower, the fragrant companion spring breeze of flower.
sentences.chinese: 绿叶护红花，花香伴春风。

sentences.english: Gerasim opened one blind, and went out of the room on tiptoe.
sentences.chinese: 格拉西姆打开一扇护窗板，踮着足走出了书斋。

definition: shield/(currency) Vietnamese dong/currency unit of several countries (Indonesian rupiah, Dutch gulden etc)
to nurse/to look after/to watch over/(old) hospital nurse
to open up a path/to make one's way through/to construct a road/(electricity) open circuit
to go all out for sth at risk of one's life
to resist/to obstruct/to hinder/to keep off/to block (a blow)/to get in the way of/cover/gear (e.g. in a car's transmission)
